00023       class europa_domain :public TREX::transaction::DomainVisitor {
00024       public:
00031         explicit europa_domain(EUROPA::DataTypeId const &type) 
00032           :m_delete(true), m_dom(type->baseDomain().copy()), m_type(type) {}
00040         explicit europa_domain(EUROPA::Domain const &dom) 
00041           :m_delete(true), m_dom(dom.copy()), m_type(dom.getDataType()) {}
00049         explicit europa_domain(EUROPA::Domain *dom) 
00050           :m_delete(false), m_dom(dom), m_type(dom->getDataType()) {}
00051         ~europa_domain() {
00052           if( m_delete ) 
00053             delete m_dom;
00054         }
00055         
00056         void visit(TREX::transaction::BasicEnumerated const *dom);
00057         void visit(TREX::transaction::BasicInterval const *dom);
00058         void visit(TREX::transaction::DomainBase const *dom, bool);
00059         
00067         EUROPA::Domain const &domain() const {
00068           return *m_dom;
00069         }
00070         EUROPA::Domain &domain() {
00071           return *m_dom;
00072         }
00074       private:
00075         bool               m_delete;
00076         EUROPA::Domain    *m_dom;
00077         EUROPA::DataTypeId m_type; 
00078       }; // TREX::europa::details::europa_domain

00080       inline void europa_restrict(EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId const &var,
00081                                   TREX::transaction::DomainBase const &dom) {
00082         europa_domain convert(var->lastDomain());
00083         dom.accept(convert);
00084         var->restrictBaseDomain(convert.domain());
00085       }
